contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 28, 2017 D Wychavon Contest (First Section)
Wychavon Contest (First Section) 10 Entertainments Contest Wychavon Festival of Brass wychavon-contest-1st-section
De Montfort (High) School, Evesham, Worcestershire, England, UK Entertainment prize: Enderby Best soloist: Peter McDonough (euphonium, Eccles Borough) Best baritones: Langley Best percussion: Sandhurst Silver Winning conductor trophy: Simon Gresswell (Enderby)
City of Cardiff (mentioned here before with Draw 10) were not withdrawn. As a Championship side at the time, they were not eligible for this Section (Info from Mr Kevin Whittaker, Contest Secretary Wychavon).
March 3, 2017, 11:32 a.m. Oct. 5, 2019, 1:48 p.m.
1 Enderby Band Simon Gresswell
2 Eccles Borough Band Mareika Gray
3 Johnstone Band Martyn Ramsay
4 Ebbw Valley Brass Gareth Ritter
5 BTM Band Jeff Hutcherson
6 Langley Band Cliff Parker
7 Gresley Colliery Band Craig Stevens
8 Crewe Brass Jamie Meredith
9 Crofton Silver Band Dean Jones
10 Foresters Brass John Davis
11 Oddfellows Brass Robert Boulter
12 Sandhurst Silver Paul McLaughlin
